title: Ep 184 | Exploding Ammo & a Lethal Baton, Why We Can't Retreat from Evil & the Sermon No One Wants
description:
Jase and Al revisit their childhood scuffles, shenanigans, and roughhousing, including exploding ammo and Willie's near-deadly baton. Phil, Jase, and Al explain why they love using Bible concordances, why we shouldn't retreat from evil, and which sermons they avoid like the plague. And Phil predicts a totalitarian future where hollering about Jesus can't be taken for granted.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
